name: PlayStation PS5 Console – God of War Ragnarök Bundle
description: From Santa Monica Studio comes the sequel to the critically acclaimed God of War (2018). Join Kratos and Atreus on a mythic journey for answers before Ragnarök arrives. Together, father and son must put everything on the line as they journey to each of the Nine Realms. Throughout stunning mythological landscapes, they’ll face fearsome enemies – from Norse gods to wild beasts – as they prepare for the showdown of their lives. Armed with his trusty weapons of war – including the Leviathan Axe and the Blades of Chaos – Kratos’ deadly skills will be tested like never before as he fights to protect his family. A host of new abilities for him and Atreus also await, leaving room for fluid, expressive and customizable combat in this epic and unflinching tale. All the while, Asgardian forces assemble… Feel your journey through the Norse realms, made possible by immersive haptic feedback and adaptive trigger functionality. Bask in the beautiful worlds you travel through, brought to life by stunning art direction and arresting attention to detail.
features: Embark on an epic and heartfelt journey alongside Kratos and Atreus with the PlayStation 5 Console – God of War Ragnarök Bundle.
Bundle includes: PlayStation 5 console, DualSense Wireless Controller, Base, HDMI Cable, AC power cord, USB cable, God of War Ragnarok full game voucher
DualSense Wireless Controller integration: Feel your journey through the Norse realms, made possible by immersive haptic feedback and adaptive trigger functionality.

Stunning visuals: Bask in the beautiful worlds you travel through, brought to life by stunning art direction and arresting attention to detail. Behold enhanced reflections, lighting and shadows, as well as increased geometric detail and enhanced deformable snow.

Fully optimized for 3D Audio*: Immerse yourself in the unique soundscapes of the Nine Realms as sounds reverberate and echo throughout the environment. Use highly accurate spatial audio to hear enemies approaching from any direction, including above and below you. *3D audio with stereo headphones (analog or USB)

name: PlayStation 5 Console – FINAL FANTASY XVI Bundle
description: Enter the dark fantasy world of Valisthea with the PlayStation®5 Console – FINAL FANTASY XVI Bundle. Play FINAL FANTASY XVI with PS5 innovations including 4K and HDR visuals*, DualSense™ wireless controller haptic feedback and incredible speed with the PS5’s SSD. FINAL FANTASY XVI on PlayStation 5 - Experience a new level of immersion made possible by the DualSense Wireless Controller’s haptic feedback and adaptive trigger functionality. Explore Valisthea’s vast and beautiful world with 4K resolution.* Enjoy shortened load times and return to the action faster than ever with the PS5 console’s high-speed SSD. * 4K resolution requires a compatible 4K TV or display.
features: Enter the dark fantasy world of Valisthea with the PlayStation5 Console – FINAL FANTASY XVI Bundle.
Play FINAL FANTASY XVI with PS5 innovations including 4K and HDR visuals*, DualSense wireless controller haptic feedback and incredible speed with the PS5’s SSD.
Bundle includes: PlayStation 5 console, DualSense Wireless Controller, Base, HDMI Cable, AC power cord, USB cable, FINAL FANTASY XVI full game voucher.

Digital content*: “Braveheart” Weapon, Gil-boost Accessory “Cait Sith Charm”**, Exp-boost Accessory “Scholar's Spectacles”**. * Digital content can be received from the “Main Menu > System > Item Post” in the game. The “Item Post” will be unlocked after approximately 2 hours of progress in the game. ** Digital content may be available for purchase at a later date.

name: PlayStation PS5™ Console – Call of Duty® Modern Warfare® II Bundle
description: Squad up with the PlayStation 5 Console – Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II Bundle and fight alongside the iconic operators of Task Force 141 on PS5. Drop into an unprecedented conflict in a globe-trotting single-player campaign with fan-favourite characters John "Soap" MacTavish, Kyle "Gaz" Garrick, Simon "Ghost" Riley and Captain John Price. Also includes: Immersive Multiplayer combat with all-new gun handling, advanced AI system and a new Gunsmith. Evolved Special Ops game mode featuring tactical co-op gameplay. A massive calendar of free content post-launch featuring evolving gameplay with new maps, modes, seasonal events, community celebrations and more. On PS5 you’ll enjoy, Faster Loading: Get into the action almost instantly with the PlayStation 5 console’s ultra-high-speed SSD and fast load times. Breathtaking Immersion: Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio* technology. Haptic Feedback: Get closer to the action with the DualSense™ wireless controller’s haptic feedback. Adaptive Triggers: Enjoy a new level of immersion when you interact with different objects using the DualSense wireless controller’s adaptive triggers. *4K and HDR require a 4K and HDR compatible TV or display.
features: Fight alongside the iconic operators of Task Force 141 with the PlayStation 5 Console – Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II Bundle
Enjoy PS5 innovations including 4K and HDR visuals, DualSense wireless controller adaptive triggers and haptic feedback, Tempest 3D AudioTech when using stereo headsets (analogue or USB) and more.
Bundle includes: PlayStation 5 console, DualSense Wireless Controller, Base, HDMI Cable, AC power cord, USB cable, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Cross-Gen Bundle full game voucher.

name: PlayStation 5 Console (PS5)
description: The PS5 console unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.
features: Model Number CFI-1215A01X
Stunning Games - Marvel at incredible graphics and experience new PS5 features.
Breathtaking Immersion - Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology.
Lightning Speed - Harness the power of a custom CPU, GPU, and SSD with Integrated I/O that rewrite the rules of what a PlayStation console can do.

name: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition
description: The PS5 Digital Edition unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games. PS5 Digital Edition is an all-digital version of the PS5 console with no disc drive. Sign into your account for PlayStation Network and go to PlayStation Store to buy and download games.
features: Model Number CFI-1215B01X
